title: NBA Draft 2019 News
text:

Knicks superfan Spike Lee spent a little more than $100K at an auction to buy the original net from Game 7 of the 1970 NBA Finals and Red Holzman's Coach of the Year trophy from that season.

Some records stand for a few years. Others become such a part of the landscape that breaking them feels like a seismic shift. Donavan Brazier breaking a 34-year-old American track record this week got us thinking about some other long-standing marks.
